mapper.select: select year(base_date) as year, company_type as ctype, sex, count(*) as total from company_social_security c, person p where c.social_security_card = p.social_security_card group by year, ctype, sex order by year, ctype, sex

select year(base_date) as year, company_type as ctype, (year(base_date) - year(p.birthday)) as age from company_social_security c, person p where c.social_security_card = p.social_security_card group by year, company_type, age order by year,company_type
select year(base_date) as year, company_type as ctype, sum(social_insurance_base) as total from company_social_security group by year, company_type order by year, ctype
select year(base_date) as year, company_type as ctype, count(distinct(social_security_card)) as personTotal from company_social_security group by year, company_type order by year, ctype
